document_data.name: Barelder
document_data.mainbody: '''Barelder''' (sometimes known as '''Bareldur''') was a noble family of [[Cormyr]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite archive/Greenwood's Grotto/2023-05-30/The Bareldurs of Cormyr}}
document_data.Activities: The Barelders held [[Windcrag House]], a farming estate and mansion on the [[Tun Shores]] in the [[West Reaches of Cormyr]]. They also possessed the small urban mansion called [[Heldartowers]] in [[Suzail]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, Lord [[Montror Barelder]] was slain at the Council of Dragons by a [[blueflame ghost]]. His corpse was removed from the Hall of Justice to the [[Chapel of the Valiant]].
document_data.Members:
* Seven Lords Barelder preceded Montror.
* Lord Montror Barelder and his wife Lady [[Asmrae Barelder]].
* Lady [[Narnathra Barelder]], who inherited from her father Montror. She married to Lord [[Varkander Heldruth]], and had Lady [[Laeyalane Tantorn]] and Lady [[Cathone Ravenhill]] as mistresses.
* [[Maereenra Barelder]] and [[Braeryl Barelder]], the children of Narnathra and Varkander.
* Two younger siblings of Narnathra.
